text: Dar rohi Alloh, cihod kuned, on guna ki soistai cihod dar rohi Ust. U sumoro ʙarguzid. Va ʙarojaton dar din hec korhoi dusvoriro ʙar dusi sumo naguzostaast. Dini padaraton Iʙrohimro ʙaroi sumo tasri' kardaast. U pes az in dar kitoʙhoi pesin va dar in Qur'on sumoro "musalmon" nomid. To Pajomʙar ʙar sumo guvoh ʙosad va sumo niz ʙar digar mardum guvoh ʙosed. Pas, namoz ʙiguzored va zakot ʙidihed va ʙa Alloh iʙodat kuned, ki U jovar va sarparasti sumo ast. Ci sarparast va sarvari nek va ci madadgor va kumakkunandai xuʙe ast
